```{r}
file_path <- "./content/post/2022-03-13-put-your-raspberry-pi-to-work/rpi-logo.png"

imgurl <- system.file(file_path,
                      package = "hexSticker")
sticker(
  imgurl,
  package = "hexSticker",
  p_size = 20,
  s_x = 1,
  s_y = .75,
  s_width = .6,
  filename = "./test.png"
)
```
